layout_strategies.hero: Full-screen height (min-h-[90vh]), centered content, large serif typography, parallax background image.
layout_strategies.product_grid: Grid layout with 1 column (mobile), 2 (tablet), 4 (desktop). Large vertical gaps (gap-y-16). Minimal product info below image.
layout_strategies.navigation: Sticky header, glassmorphism. Logo centered or left. Minimal links. 'Shop' mega-menu.
layout_strategies.footer: Clean, 4-column grid. Large typography for 'Newsletter' section. Minimal social icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPORT FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to the top of /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Update /app/frontend/tailwind.config.js to extend the font family with 'serif': ['Playfair Display', 'serif'] and 'sans': ['Manrope', 'sans-serif'].

3. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the color variables in /app/frontend/src/index.css with the 'colors.palette' values defined in this JSON. Ensure 'radius' is set to '0rem' or '0.125rem' for that sharp luxury look.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components (Buttons, Inputs, Cards), override the default rounded classes with 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm'.
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'container' class with 'max-w-7xl' for main content to ensure it doesn't stretch too wide on large screens, maintaining the editorial look.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
7. ANIMATION: Apply 'animate-in fade-in slide-in-from-bottom-4' to all major sections as they scroll into view.
8. NAVIGATION: Implement a sticky header with the 'glass' style defined in visual_enhancers.
9. TESTING: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs) as requested.
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle textures.
Use 2-3x more whitespace than typical SaaS apps.
Typography hierarchy is key: Big Serif Headings vs Small Sans Body.
No 'pill' shaped buttons; stick to sharp or slightly rounded rectangles.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (opacity change or underline).
